description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER:  IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that Mission City Management,  Inc.s and Courage 2012 LLCs Motion to Dismiss [ECF No.  21 ]; James R. Leininger's Motion to  Dismiss [ECF No.  32 ]; and Michael Dale Huckabees Motion to Dismiss [ECF No .  36 ] are HELD in  ABEYANCE, pending additional briefing by the parties. IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the parties shall brief the issues discussed above. Plaintiffs shall submit their brief addressing the issues within twenty (20)  days of the entry  of this Order. Defendants shall file their response to Plaintiff's briefs within ten  (10) days of Plaintiffs' filing of their brief.  (Response to Court due by 4/24/2014.)  Signed by District Judge E. Richard Webber on April 4, 2014. (BRP)
